days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here…)

Daily Prayer

Give peace, O Lord, in our days: for there is none other that fights for us, but only You, our God. Peace be within Your walls, O Lord. And abundance within Your towers.

Concluding Prayer

A Prayer for Peace
O God, from whom proceed all holy desires, all right counsels and just works, grant unto us Your servants that peace which the world cannot give, that our hearts may be devoted to Your service, and that, being delivered from fear, we may pass our time in peace under Your protection. Amen. 
Ave Augustissima (Hail Most Venerable)
Hail, you that are most Venerable, Queen of Peace, most holy Mother of God; through the Sacred Heart of Jesus your Son, the Prince of Peace, cause His anger to cease from us, so that He may reign over us in peace. Remember, O most gracious Virgin Mary, that never was it known that anyone who sought your prayers was forsaken by God. Inspired with this confidence, I come unto you. Despise not my petitions, O Mother of the Incarnate Word; but in your loving kindness hear and answer me, O merciful, O kind, O sweet Virgin Mary.
Our Father (3 times)
Our Father, Who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name; Thy kingdom come; Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread; and forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us; and lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.  Amen.
Hail Mary (3 times)
Hail, Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee. Blessed art thou amongst women and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus. Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our death. Amen.
Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us.

days.title: Day 3 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here…)

Daily Prayer

Holy Virgin, venerable Queen of Peace, obtain for me of your Son the peace which He has left as a heritage to His disciples. The world knows it not and cannot give it; it resides only in hearts pure and sanctified by grace. May I preserve this heavenly peace with my superiors by submission and respect; with my equals by meekness; with my inferiors by patience and kindness; with God, and with myself by the practice of all virtues. Grant it also to the Church, to my family, to my friends, and to all humankind. Obtain for me the grace to live here on earth in the peace of innocence in order to merit the eternal peace of Heaven. Amen.

days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here…)

Daily Prayer

O great Queen of Peace, it is through the love of your blessed Heart that the God of love and peace was given to humankind; it is through you that all schisms and heresies which divide the true fold of your beloved Son are suppressed; it is through you that peace fills the hearts of people of good will—those who renounce themselves to live according to the law of God. Oh, make this sweet  peace reign in the Church of Christ and in our souls! Amen.

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here…)

O glorious Mother of the great Prince of Peace, of Him Who came down from Heaven to bring peace to the world, obtain for us through your intercession, a universal peace. We beseech you, fill our hearts with love of our holy religion, and make all nations enjoy a perfect tranquility, serving your Son in the perfection of a truly Christian life. Amen.

days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here…)

Daily Prayer

How much praise do we not owe you, O Mary! Through you the barrier between Heaven and earth has been removed; through your admirable maternity, O glorious Queen, more resplendent than the stars, you have revoked the curse which has weighed upon us since the fall of Eve. Hail, then, O Virgin, cause of our joy; hail, Queen, who obtained peace! Hail, full of grace, the Lord is with you, He Who is before you, and with you. To Him, with the Father and the Holy Spirit, be praise now and forever. Amen.

days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here…)

Daily Prayer

We rejoice with you, O Mary, on account of all your virtues, but we rejoice especially because of your mercy, since it is through mercy that you are for us the Queen of Peace. Truly, your mercy has obtained the redemption of the world and the salvation of humankind. May our longing souls, therefore, hasten to this salutary source, and may our misery appeal to your inexhaustible mercy! Amen.

days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here…)

Daily Prayer

Most holy Virgin Mary, venerable Queen of Peace, full of confidence in your goodness, and animated with a lively desire to serve you, we consecrate ourselves to you now and forever, and we promise to do all in our power to make you known, loved, and honored. Deign to receive us among your privileged children; deign to watch over us and to protect us. Obtain, we beseech you, for Holy Mother Church, for our country, for us and those dear to us, that great gift of peace which your Divine Son appointed you to dispense to the world. Amen.
